name: Jumpy Boy (City)
description:
Jumpy Boy, a colorful endless game in 16bits style. Are you ready to destroy everything you see??

Story:
"Modern society has transformed everybody in a square. They all do, think, act, like the society bosses want. But there is a guy who wants to be free from all this. His name is Jumpy BOY!"

Key Features:
* Uber Fast Gameplay!
* Destroy Everything! Featuring Cars, Nyan Cat Ads, Trees, and more!
* 6 kinds of missions! Destroy the monsters, get the coins, resist for n* Seconds, and more!
* 10 Difficulties! Will you last till the 10th?
* DOGS!...i mean... DOGS!!!

And in the future:
* 2 Players Mode! Who will Stand more?
* Story Mode! Fight against Giant Bosses!
* New Stages! Get out of the City and chase new adventures!
* New Powers! Shields, Laser Beams And who Knows! Suggest new Powers!

Follow Us on Facebook :) and drop a like for free gems!
https://www.facebook.com/thejumpyboy
